name: Sunday Mornings are for Forts
description:
Headphones highly recommended!! Works best in fullscreen.

Voices by Alicia, Isabel, and Diego Garcia.

Special thanks to Alanna and Carlos Garcia.

Made for Global Game Jam 2019, for the theme "What Does Home Mean To You?" and dedicated to the Garcias.

Music: "simple relaxing guitar loop" by Kodack, sourced from freesound.org.

Misc. SFX also sourced from freesound.
